titleStmt.title: The communion of saincts A treatise of the fellowship that the faithful have with God, and his angels, and one with an other; in this present life. Gathered out of the holy Scriptures, by H.A.
titleStmt.author: Ainsworth, Henry, 1571-1622?

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed: Henry Ainsworth.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
